content: p2 to end -optionally you could place a stitch marker between each 9-stitch repeat row 3- k2 p2 k3 p2 to end row 4- k2 p2 k3 p2 to end row 5- k2 p2 k3 p2 to end row 6- k2 p2 k3 p2 to end row 7- k2 p2 k3 p2 to end repeat row 2-7 16 times more chart below to mark off repeats section 3 -you will be decreasing in this section if you would like a slouchy hat repeat the above row 2-7 5 more times then follow the section below row 1- k2 p2 cluster 2/1 p2 to end row 2- k2tog p2 k3 p2 to end 16sts decreased 128sts remain row 3- k1 p2 k3 p2 to end row 4- k1 p2 k3 p2 to end row 5- k1 p2 k3 p2 to end row 6- k1 p2 k3 p2 to end row 7- k1 p2tog cluster 2/1 p2 to end 16sts decreased 112sts remain row 8- k1 p1 k3 p2 to end row 9- k1 p1 k3 p2tog to end 16sts decreased 96sts remain row 10- k1 p1 k3 p1 to end row 11- k1 p1 k1 k2tog p1 to end 16sts decreased 80sts remain row 12- p2tog k2tog p1 to end 32sts decreased 48sts remain row 13- k2tog p1 to end 16sts decreased 32sts remain row 14- ssk to end 16sts decreased 16sts remain row 15- ssk to end 8sts decreased 8sts remain -cut your yarn leaving a tail long enough to draw through your remaining stitches and weave in -draw your tail through your remaining stitches several times for strength and weave in weave in your ends wash and block your hat if you wish this hat is great on its own or you could embellish the top with a fur or yarn pom-pom if you have any pattern questions or comments please contact me via email sheltipap1@gmail com -or- ravelry dm sheltipap -or- www katiedegroffknits com be sure to create a project page on ravelry for your hat and tag me on instagram @sheltipap and #smallblessingshat i love to see my patterns worked up ©k atie d e gr of f 20 2 2 for p e r s onal us e onl y
